title: Traderboard
author: Traderboard
content: This thread is for users using the binance leaderboard only.                    BTC Traderboard.app  We've built an automated copy-trading software to help all those who are trying to follow   a binance Leaderboard member.                    FeaturesCopy Millionaires positions in real timeFast trade opening/closingMail notification system (soon telegram also)Based on safe binance API  https://traderboard.app  Available to help and answer any question.  Please be kind and if something is not clear, just ask.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Why should people not use Traderwagon? Traderwagon is recommended by Binance and if you open Binance, go to future trading, leader board, you will see Traderwagon which you can be a lead trader or a copy trader.

comments.author: Traderboard
comments.body: There are two problems with it.Not every leaderboard trader is on traderwagon, while we can add any trader of user choice.TW's limited slots make it very difficult to follow good traders.Also soon we'll implement bybit and other exchanges

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Traderboard on December 05, 2022, 10:25:49 PMAlso soon we'll implement bybit and other exchanges  You should add a free trial period of sorts if possible. Trying out and subscribing for a brand-new product that one is not sure of the outcomes is quite trickyAlso, let us know when you added support for exchanges. Am not a fan of copy trading, but sometimes I like to try out new things

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on December 05, 2022, 11:44:02 PMYou should add a free trial period of sorts if possible. Trying out and subscribing for a brand-new product that one is not sure of the outcomes is quite trickyI think it's risky to connect our API to an unknown or newly created website even if they are going to give a free trial I can't trust them anytime they can able to send API without our consent.@Traderboard I suggest building trust first here since your service involves money and new we do not know how safe your service is. You can try to start by hiring a campaign manager and promote it here on the forum through the signature campaign with escrowed funds.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on December 11, 2022, 05:11:49 PMI think it's risky to connect our API to an unknown or newly created website even if they are going to give a free trial I can't trust them anytime they can able to send API without our consent.I agree. This is sound advice. Not just unknown or newly created websites but also old known sites and bots.3commas had an API key exploit where lots of traders lots money not so long ago ----> Binance Accounts Exploited Due To 3Commas API Key HackWith this kind of threat, I think traders have to go an extra mile and all the API key to trade from whitelisted IP addresses

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Traderboard on December 05, 2022, 10:25:49 PMThere are two problems with it.Not every leaderboard trader is on traderwagon, while we can add any trader of user choice.TW's limited slots make it very difficult to follow good traders.Also soon we'll implement bybit and other exchanges  It seems like you have a lot of plans, but your plan doesn't seem to include building the trust of the community here in cryptocurrency dude. This should be your priority, let's say you are campaigning what you are sharing here, you should show elegance first so that the community here will be attracted to you. I just suggest this to you, because if you don't do it, I think that no matter how much hype you do, you will have a hard time gaining the trust of people here on this platform.You should also have a free trial for your prospects here as one of the commenters said here, dude.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Would have been nice if you offer something of a free trial to your target market. TW offers a good copytrading system and people have been using them without any problems for the past few months. Pretty sure they'll be looking to roll out this service to Bybit as well. I have tried Traderwagon and it seems pretty straightforward. If you can offer something greater than that then perhaps you'll have a shot in the market. But as a new competitor your first goal should be to gain trust; have some trusted members of this forum vouch for your product by letting them try it out for a week or two and get their reviews.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on December 05, 2022, 11:44:02 PMYou should add a free trial period of sorts if possible. Trying out and subscribing for a brand-new product that one is not sure of the outcomes is quite trickyAlso, let us know when you added support for exchanges. Am not a fan of copy trading, but sometimes I like to try out new thingsthat is true we need some kind of tester before consider to join your platform right. and I'm curious is your platform do direct trading in our exchange or they only send some kind of signal Quote from: BitMaxz on December 11, 2022, 05:11:49 PMI think it's risky to connect our API to an unknown or newly created website even if they are going to give a free trial I can't trust them anytime they can able to send API without our consent.@Traderboard I suggest building trust first here since your service involves money and new we do not know how safe your service is. You can try to start by hiring a campaign manager and promote it here on the forum through the signature campaign with escrowed funds.Yes and this also true is very risky, to create API before known well of your company.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Traderboard on December 05, 2022, 10:25:49 PM...Also soon we'll implement bybit and other exchanges  What will be the difference between your service in this case, from what Bybit provides? After all, such copy trading is provided by this exchange for free. In addition, similar services are available on other exchanges and they, as well as on Bybit, are free for the user, and the commission is paid only for profit orders.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on December 05, 2022, 11:44:02 PMQuote from: Traderboard on December 05, 2022, 10:25:49 PMAlso soon we'll implement bybit and other exchanges  You should add a free trial period of sorts if possible. Trying out and subscribing for a brand-new product that one is not sure of the outcomes is quite trickyAm in support of this and Op should enable free trials so those interested will check it up. It is not enough to advertise a new product and expect people to rush into it without trial. Eventhough am not a convert of copy trading because I like to buy or sell manually by my prediction and choice.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Traderboard on January 01, 2023, 08:42:37 AMThis is a bumpQuote from: Traderboard on December 31, 2022, 08:42:34 AMThis is a bumpQuote from: Traderboard on December 28, 2022, 03:46:37 PMThis is a bumpQuote from: Traderboard on December 27, 2022, 03:46:32 PMThis is a bumpWhat's the point of a bumps thread if you don't answer the questions that forum members ask you? In addition, such actions are a violation of the rules of the forum, which can lead to a ban. So according to paragraphs 13 and 21 of the rules, "Bumps, "updates" are limited to once per 24 hours per thread" while "old bumps should be deleted" - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0

comments.author: Osama Maaz
comments.body: Quote from: dothebeats on December 22, 2022, 05:15:07 PMWould have been nice if you offer something of a free trial to your target market. TW offers a good copytrading system and people have been using them without any problems for the past few months. Pretty sure they'll be looking to roll out this service to Bybit as well. I have tried Traderwagon and it seems pretty straightforward. If you can offer something greater than that then perhaps you'll have a shot in the market. But as a new competitor your first goal should be to gain trust; have some trusted members of this forum vouch for your product by letting them try it out for a week or two and get their reviews.There are many advantages of giving users fee trials, users trust increase , your site traffic increased also our site reviews between users shares , So first try to make community friendly then start to take fee .

comments.author: Traderboard
comments.body: Quote from: whitegold22 on May 01, 2023, 12:49:08 AMFree trial?We can provide 3 days free trial, kindly login and open a ticket on website.
